descriptionHtml:
[center]


[size=4].: About :.[/size][/center]

[center]This Race Menu preset is for my Nord character Luna

In my canon, Luna was born to Krai and Vermillion, two rogue-ish retired adventurers who had taken up homesteading in the forest between Riverwood and Whiterun. They taught Luna a great deal about surviving on the bounties of the wilds, using a bow and blade, and manipulating natural ingredients in alchemy. 

Luna is a warrior who utilizes her Thu'um, a 1H blade, and Alteration and Restoration magic to heal herself and her allies and control the battlefield. 


[size=4].: Requirements :. [/size]

This mod requires:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]RaceMenu[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70363/?]KS Hairdos HDT [/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]The Eyes of Beauty
[/url]SKSE

Thanks for checking out my mod! :)

Check out my other female Nord preset: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/85856/?]Vermillion Star-Weaver[/url]

::: Please report any issues to me via comments or posts or PM :::

[/center]
author: ckaplan5
